name: Pediatric Chiropractic Book
descr: Two widely recognized pediatric authorities provide a comprehensive resource that covers a wide range of information on pediatric chiropractic care. An international panel of over thirty experts has participated as contributors in this important text. Among the many topics included are care during pregnancy and the perinatal period, subluxation, clinical and radiologic examination, child abuse, adolescent health, spinal trauma, scoliosis, neurology, the challenged child, pediatric nutrition, vaccination issues, and full spine and cranial adjustment.
